title: What is the League XMPP server connection information?
body: If I want to connect to the League of Legends chat server from an XMPP app, what is the information I need? I've seen lots of threads on this but many are 3+ years old.

replies.body: I had to reach out to my tech buddies for this one! The league client doesn't actually support this kind of thing anymore, unfortunately, but luckily we did release a mobile app that has League chat functionality so you can still chat without being on the client. Be sure to check that out [**over here**](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/download-free-league-friends-mobile-app)!
